<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mature Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1903) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50), [Undead Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=176) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Beastmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1900)

</column>

---

All of your animal companions grow up, becoming [mature animal companions](/Rules.aspx?ID=155) and gaining additional capabilities. During an encounter, even if you don't use the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn to either Stride or Strike.

<title level="2">Mature Beastmaster Companion leads to...</title>
[Incredible Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1905), [Lead the Pack](/Feats.aspx?ID=1909)
name: Mature Beastmaster Companion
